property.name: linkLabel
property.value: View @{searchResults.size() lt 2 ? 'course' : 'all '+searchResults.size()+' courses'} in full details

property.name: title
property.value: View @{searchResults.size() lt 2 ? 'course' : 'all '+searchResults.size()+' courses'} in full details

property.name: title
property.value: You have @{searchResults.size()} courses in your list

bean.p:label: Last Offered

bean.p:render: @{#line.courseDetails.lastOffered eq null and #line.courseDetails.scheduledTerms.size() eq 0 ? true : false}

property.name: clientSideJs
property.value: alert('This course has been moved to your plan');

property.name: title
property.value: You have @{searchResults.size()} courses in your list

bean.p:messageText: Your List Is Empty. Find Courses and Save them to your list.
